description:
You will received detailed training in the New Way of Implementing SAP and the ASAP 8 Methodology enabling you to successfully understand and use the ASAP methodology on your SAP project.

What our students are saying
“Best lectures to learn ASAP 8 ”. Mr. Alamdar Syed

“From the point of a practitioner the course is nice and short giving key information about
the latest methodology”.  Mr. Swapan Sarkar

The course is specifically aimed to providing Project managers, SAP Team Leads and Consultants with the latest knowledge of the ASAP 8 Methodology to help you be successfully in your role implementing SAP.

ASAP 8 is the latest version of the Accelerated SAP Methodology which are fully compatible with the PMI Project Management methodology.

Understanding the ASAP Methodology is an important part of passing the SAP Associate Project Manager certification.

The course will provide you with:

  • Understanding of the new way of implementing SAP

  • The ASAP Methodology Taxonomy

  • Explain the target audience and project roles used by the ASAP Methodology

  • Explain the Benefits of using the ASAP Methodology

  • Detailed training in the ASAP Methodology Phases and Key deliverables

  • Provide a step by step guide on how to access the ASAP Methodology

The training is delivered though video lessons combined with downloadable material to enhance you learning.
title: Become an expert in the new SAP ASAP 8 Methodology.
